did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of Frances Parkinson Keyes 1952 and n.d.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Frances Parkinson Keyes, Accession #3923, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of the author on April 12, 1993.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes the manuscript of Steamboat Gothic,notes and portrait.
Manuscript written in pencil in 26 composition blank books; unpaginated or with various paginations, approx. 100 pages per book.

did.unittitle: Menu for a dinner at the Sulgrave Club, Washington, DC, "to compliment all those who helped her in the preparation of Steamboat Gothic" (2 copies, each autographed by some of the guests) and an invitation inscribed to John C. Wyllie. 1952 Nov 17
Notes on various subjects and supplied by various sources, unbound; unpaginated or with various paginations, approx. 150 pages total no date
Formal photographic portrait of Frances Parkinson Keyes by André Snow, Brookline, MA, inscribed to the University of Virginia. no date
